## Packages

```{r packages}
CRANpackages <- c("tidyverse", "ggplot2", "ggpubr", "ggstats","BiocManager","ggrepel")
biocPackages <- c("DESeq2")
for(i in CRANpackages){
  if(!(i %in% rownames(installed.packages()))){
    install.packages(pkgs = i)
  }
  library(package = i, character.only = T, quietly = T)
  rm(i)
}

for(i in biocPackages){
  if(!(i %in% rownames(installed.packages()))){
    BiocManager::install(i, ask = FALSE)
  }
  library(package = i, character.only = T, quietly = T)
  rm(i)
}

rm(CRANpackages, biocPackages)



```
